Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Unleashing Telco Innovation: Agentic AI & Connected Intelligence | BRK385
Description:
Discover how telecoms are leveraging Microsoft AI and cloud solutions to unify data and automate network and business operations to boost efficiency, accelerate service delivery, and grow beyond connectivity.
